data.message: Wow don't Understand Much of It But it is incredible how Far Technology has gone before we Know it everything will B Solar passenger Planes and So On Etc.   Wonders of humanity.

replies.message: Hi Angel. Incredible, indeed! Thanks for stopping by. :) -Azaria
Started to clap along with you when it took off. Thank You, Facebook. Put a smile on my face today.
Please give them access to only Disney movies for one year.

I wonder if Facebook and or the company that built Aquila might be interested in helping fund a 1/3 model, or a similar craft to be built at a high school. I have the non profit, the school and students, the advisers at the high school,  including access to engineers at Virgin Galactic, Space Ship One and Scaled Composites. We can help raise the funding and assist in bringing the a team together to do this for and with budding engineers. I imagine a similar project but with new technology that Facebook and other might wish to explore using students and interns.
Who do I contact? 
I am dead serious.
